content: skalbagge cabled hat by imagine gnats page 1 this beginner-friendly cabled hat is knit from the bottom up starting with a rib band and working into alternating cables that decrease into the crown various yarn weights and needle sizes are used to translate this 24 stitch repeat pattern into sizes for the whole family m1bl increase - make 1 stitch by casting on a backwards loop with working yarn ssk decrease - slip next two stitches knitwise one at a time pass stitches back onto left needle and knit two stitches together through back loops k2tog decrease - knit 2 stitches together p2tog decrease - purl 2 stitches together cblf x slip x stitches to cable needle & hold in front k x k x from cable needle cblb x slip x stitches to cable needle & hold in back k x k x from cable needle sts stitches co cast on skalbagge cabled hat by imagine gnats page 2 hat type fits head circumference adult bulky cabled beanie 21-25 adult cabled beanie 21-23 adult cabled slouch 21-23 kids cabled beanie 18-19 kids cabled slouch 18-20 toddler cabled beanie 16-17 baby cabled beanie 13-15 photos links and addt l info http //imaginegnats com/knitting-skalbagge-cabled-hat pattern on ravelry http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/skalbagge-cabled-hat tag your projects #skalbaggecabledhat skalbagge cabled hat by imagine gnats page 3 yarn 135 yds worsted or light worsted / gauge on larger needles 4 = 16 sts/20 row needle sizes 9 & 10 5 16 circular needles and/or dpns finished hat measures circumference 15 / height 9 ribbing use smaller needles co 80 sts using the long-tail method place bor marker and join being careful not to twist stitches k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 p2 repeat to end of row repeat ribbing row in pattern until work measures 2 from cast on edge body of hat switch to larger needles 1 k2 m1bl k4 m1bl k2 p2 repeat to end of row 96 sts 2-5 k10 p2 6 cblf5 p2 k10 p2 7-11 repeat row 2 12 k10 p2 cblb5 p2 13-17 repeat row 2 18-25 repeat row 6-13 begin decrease row switch to dpns when necessary 26 ssk k6 k2tog p2 k10 p2 27 k8 p2 k10 p2 28 - ssk k4 k2tog p2 k10 p2 29 cblf3 p2 k10 p2 30 k6 p2 ssk k6 k2tog p2 31 k6 p2 k8 p2 32 k6 p2 ssk k4 k2tog p2 33 k6 p2 34 ssk k2 k2tog p2 cblb3 p2 35 k4 p2 k6 p2 36 ssk k2tog p2tog k6 p2tog 37 k1 ssk ssk k2 k2tog p1 38 ssk ssk k2tog p1 39 ssk k2tog 8 sts remain cut working yarn and thread tapestry needle pull through remaining stitches weave in ends and block to finished hat measurements skalbagge cabled hat by imagine gnats page 4 yarn 140 yds dk or light worsted / gauge on larger needles 4 = 20 sts/24 row needle sizes 5 & 7 16 circular needles and/or dpns finished hat measures circumference
